cause.description:
Where does Mitt Romney stand on Net Neutrality and Internet freedom? Nobody knows.
This group will engage in issue advocacy - hoping to convince Romney to break with the traditional Republican stance of opposing Internet freedom. Mitt, please...support Net Neutrality and Internet Freedom.
1. Internet freedom is important
2. Net Neutrality is vital to the future of the Internet
cause.mission: convince Mitt Romney to support Internet freedom and Net Neutrality
cause.name: Mitt Romney
